metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Anarchy has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Anarchy has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Dorian,  and A Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
